lead_paragraph: Bolstered by a birdie-birdie finish, Charlie Wi shot a five-under-par 65 in windy conditions at PGA National, giving him a one-shot lead over Bernhard Langer after one round of the Honda Classic.
snippet: Bolstered by a birdie-birdie finish, Charlie Wi shot a five-under-par 65 in windy conditions at PGA National, giving him a one-shot lead over Bernhard Langer after one round of the Honda Classic.
